nodes.text: Sector Monitors were civilian spy agencies that were part of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order's Coalition for Progress. They collected intelligence on cultural progress within the Galactic Empire, allowing governmental agencies to act whenever "corrections" were required.

Sector Monitors used their vast surveillance network to monitor the development of art, science, education, commerce, and law enforcement. The Sector Monitors would report information of suspicious activities to the Imperial Security Bureau, while data on cultural shifts against the New Order were reported to the Coalition for Improvements.
